snippet.title: Far Cry 6: Xbox Gameplay Overview Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Watch new #FarCry6 gameplay from the Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase. 
https://www.xbox.com/games/far-cry-6

Take down settlements with the help of an angry alligator Fang for Hire, resolver weapons, and customizable backpacks. Bring freedom back to Yara with co-op matchmaking.
